attributes.action: reaffirm this government's faith in scientific evidence by re-instating Professor David Nutt as Chair of the Advisory Committee on Drug Abuse with immediate effect. We also petition that the Prime Minister acknowledges that Professor Nutt's initial dismissal was a wrongful act of political interference with rational scientific argument, and that such actions will only lead to further confusion in the United Kingdom's drug-vulnerable youth population
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
